title: Bookmarks
description: A curated list of essential links and resources for web development, system administration, and online tooling.

Web Development.name: MDN Web Docs
Web Development.description: Official documentation and learning resources for web technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Web Development.name: Stack Overflow
Web Development.description: Community-driven Q&A site for programming problems and solutions.

title: Film Canon
description: A curated collection of films and series considered essential transmissions.

Films & Series.name: Blade Runner (1982)
Films & Series.description: A seminal work of science fiction, exploring themes of humanity, memory, and artificial intelligence in a rain-drenched, neon-lit future.

Films & Series.name: Serial Experiments Lain (1998)
Films & Series.description: An anime series that delves into themes of communication, identity, and technology's impact on consciousness, presaging much of modern internet culture.

title: Game Canon
description: A curated collection of video games considered essential transmissions.

Games.name: Deus Ex (2000)
Games.description: A cyberpunk-themed action RPG lauded for its player agency, intricate level design, and branching narrative that explores conspiracy and transhumanism.

Games.name: Pathologic 2 (2019)
Games.description: A narrative-driven survival thriller where you have 12 days to save a town consumed by a deadly plague. A game about the inevitability of failure.

title: Glossary
description: A personal glossary defining the specific jargon, acronyms, and neologisms used throughout this node.

General.name: Node
General.description: A single instance of this website or a person's digital garden on the distributed web.

General.name: Transmission
General.description: A blog post or article. The act of sending a signal from this node.

General.name: Webring
General.description: A collection of websites linked together in a circular structure, usually organized around a specific topic.

Technical.name: Local-First
Technical.description: Software architecture where data is stored and managed on the user's device first, and then synced with a server. This site uses a 'local-first' authoring approach via Obsidian, but is deployed statically.

Technical.name: Brutalism
Technical.description: In web design, a style characterized by raw, minimalist, and often unstyled HTML. It prioritizes function over form.

title: Music Canon
description: A curated collection of music considered essential transmissions.

Albums.name: Selected Ambient Works 85–92 - Aphex Twin
Albums.description: A landmark album in ambient techno that combines dreamy soundscapes with intricate rhythms, defining a genre.

title: Network
description: A curated list of other nodes, communities, and aggregators in the distributed web worth monitoring. An expansion of the webring.

Webring & Allies.name: Hundred Rabbits
Webring & Allies.description: A small artist studio aboard a sailboat, creating and exploring open-source tools and games.

Webring & Allies.name: Melonking
Webring & Allies.description: The personal website and art portfolio of an indie game developer. Known for Sludge Life.

Webring & Allies.name: Xandra's Zone
Webring & Allies.description: A personal site about technology, philosophy, and creating on the internet. Focus on Go, Linux, and self-hosting.

Aggregators & News.name: Hacker News
Aggregators & News.description: A social news website focusing on computer science and entrepreneurship.

title: Projects
description: A showcase of personal projects, tools, and utilities developed using technologies like Bash, SvelteKit, and Linux.

Software Development.name: Personal Blog
Software Development.description: A static site blog built with Hugo, used for sharing thoughts and tutorials.

Software Development.name: Game Modding Tool
Software Development.description: A custom utility written in Python to automate mod packaging for a favorite game.

title: Reading List
description: A log of books, papers, and long-form articles that have shaped my processing in fields like cybernetics, economics, and technology.

Cybernetics & Systems Theory.name: Cybernetics: Or Control and Communication in the Animal and the Machine
Cybernetics & Systems Theory.description: The foundational text of cybernetics by Norbert Wiener, exploring feedback systems.

Cybernetics & Systems Theory.name: Introduction to Cybernetics
Cybernetics & Systems Theory.description: A classic text by W. Ross Ashby that provides a clear, rigorous introduction to the principles of cybernetics.

Economics & Politics.name: Debt: The First 5,000 Years
Economics & Politics.description: An anthropological history of debt by David Graeber, challenging conventional economic narratives.

Economics & Politics.name: Seeing Like a State
Economics & Politics.description: James C. Scott's analysis of why large-scale state projects to improve the human condition often fail.

Technology & Culture.name: The Cathedral and the Bazaar
Technology & Culture.description: Eric S. Raymond's seminal essay on open-source software development methods.

title: Software Stack
description: A list of software, tools, and workflows I use for development, system administration, and daily operations on Linux.

Version Control.name: Git
Version Control.description: A distributed version control system for tracking code changes and collaborating with others.

Containerization.name: Docker
Containerization.description: A platform to build, run, and manage applications inside lightweight containers.

Editors & IDEs.name: Visual Studio Code
Editors & IDEs.description: A popular, lightweight code editor with support for debugging, Git, and extensions.

API & Testing.name: Postman
API & Testing.description: An API platform for building, testing, and using APIs efficiently.

title: Userscripts
description: A collection of custom userscripts for browsers (via Violentmonkey/Greasemonkey) to enhance web browsing and automate tasks.

Browser Automation.name: YouTube Playlist Saver
Browser Automation.description: A userscript that extracts video links from a playlist and exports them as a text file.

Browser Automation.name: Dark Mode Enforcer
Browser Automation.description: A userscript that forces dark mode on websites that don’t support it natively.
